original_title: Pullin' the Devil by the Tail
overview: A black goat talks to three old Irish folk-punks as they're walking home one night, and they freak out and kill it. The Devil turns up and claims it was his goat. He challenges them to play him a good song. If he likes it, he'll let them go. If he doesn't...
title: Pullin' the Devil by the Tail
